This game match-making is retarded

Par ma barbe... ! Ce jeu est un bras de développeur dans le rectum. Véritablement, ils vous vendent du rêve. Un jeu avec une ambiance excellente, un système de jeu "coop" contre des tueurs aux styles sympa...
Mais concrètement, vous vous retrouvez à camper dans un lobby pour attendre des parties parce que les dev' ne veulent pas investir dans des serveurs décents.

DES BUGS. PARTOUT. DES INEGALITES. Un matchmaking qui vous fout des pro-gamers ( avec des compétences TRES avantageuses ) contre des joueurs casuals ( sans compétence ). Coincés dans un décor, bloqué dans une animation... touché à des distances pas possibles... Vous en baverez, vous ragerez.

Hormis ça. La désillusion totale pour moi, au lieu de trouver un jeu avec un semblant d'ambiance et de réalisme. Vous tombez sur une bouse bien arcade à souhait, impossible de vous cacher. Vous vous contentez de courir et de laisser vos potes mourir.

Bref. Au diable ce jeu. REMBOURSEZ-MOI.

Love this game! Always fun when I get to play rounds with my friends. I also love the fact that the devs actually listen to us and touch base weekly to discuss about further updates with game and exciting things to come. Thanks for making a game I've grown addicted to! :)
Fun game. However, the matchmaking is totally broken - takes more than an hour to find a single lobby. Do not buy this game until matchmaking is fixed.

If you look past the bugs and flaws this game has it's a really great game. It takes a whole lot of grinding to be able to compete at a ''high'' level and it feels great when you finally have a good set of perks. 

I feel like the community has been really harsh when it comes to reviews and rating, and the majority of the people that downrated looked at the games flaws alone. The devs should arguably have postponed the release date, or rather release it as in early access, which they didn't do, most likely for sales reasons.

There are still and will always be bugs in the game, but i'm more than happy to spend 20$ (estimated translation from eu currency) for the game at the state it is now, and what it was at release too.

1.find 3 walking on your property and they are stealing from your boxes
2.you pick up your weapon  to defemd your
3.you find a the evil guy who is tresspassing destroying your generator 
4.know u hit the villain and carry him to your nearest hook
5. his evil buddy come to save him but you say "i dont think so"
6.put other tresspasser on another hook that u have found near by while a demonic spider borrows the first tresspasser

so ty u demonic spider for the blood points
Pretty good Game with his own flavour :-)
Still broken after 2 years of release....have had to CTRL, ALT, DEL close the game due to issues.....sort it out!
It's not perfect, but it's fun. The devs are very involved, and it can only go up from here.

Great game concept that has some issues, but the developers are quite active in fixing those issues.
Playing as the killer or survivor are individually great experiences, and the low cost of the game makes it totally worth it. The developers are quite active in squashing bugs, balancing, and releasing cool new content.
However, the numerous bugs and balancing issues that have yet to be addressed are often exploited with impunity. Additionally, the matchmaking system is quite frustrating (queing up with 4 friends as survivors has literally taken me 30 minutes). In spite of my issues with this game it's been fun and totally worthwhile, and the devs appear to be getting around to dealing with my issues with the game.

Jeu très amusant. Matchmaking à chier. Impossible de s'inviter dans une session. Nous devons espérer rejoindre la même session lors de la recheche d'une session. La recherche d'une ne fonctionne pas très souvent. Je doit spammer(à répétition) le bouton "rejoindre la session" pour esspèrer que le loading, ne sois pas pour nous rammener au bouton "rejoindre la session". Très decu de ce point sinon, lorsque nous trouvons une session(ce qui est rare), le jeu est très amusant.

The loadout for finding a match is still not that great. Need to see if you can improve that. I try to start a match and it right away says failed multiple times. It feels like a waste of time just to try and start a game and it gets frustrating. Also ive lost multiple offerings and bloodpoints when the game freezes on me when I escape. Not very happy about that. Let me know if theres anything you can do! Other than that, its a very addicting and great game! Thanks!

This game has serious problem that are not getting addressed. Ex. Killers putting one person on the hook and literally standing there untill they die. There is no punishment for this and it happens a lot. The fun factor for the player on the hook is 0.
Prepare to scream like a little girl when your friends teleport in front of you, very fun though
This game runs well for how big it is
Best horror/ Survival game better then slenderman

Très bon jeu.  Principe simple mais ô combien efficace, de très beaux graphiques et une très belle ambiance sonore. La nouvelle mise-à-jour nous donne une nouvelle survivante et une tueuse effrayante.  Plusieurs bugs ont été corrigés. Pour le rapport qualité/prix et le plaisir qu'il est possible dans tirer je le recommande. Il est claire que les concepteurs désirent faire plaisir aux joueurs et plus le temps va passer, plus le jeu prendra de la profondeur.

The game we're all afraid to uninstall because we keep holding out for the gameplay itself.

To abbreviate things, when the game works it's incredibly fun to play. The other side to that as you can imagine is that the game just doesn't work. At all. One word to sum up the entirety of this game would indeed be "broken", which I hesitate to use on anything that doesn't deserve it. Well Dead By Daylight, you do deserve it, well done. Every patch that gets released seems to only make new problems and barely fix the old as well.


DLC: The first pay for DLC is out now, and the first thing I see is...cosmetics. Cosmetics that they didn't even try for a reskin. It's literally just the same clothes you can always wear only recolored slightly and actually...kind of really garishly. I get it's supposed to be 80's wear but it's just kind of disgusting. Well done, thanks for the terrible skins that are just the same clothes with different colors, oh and you want me to pay for that? Hah Hah, God, you really are funny people you know that? 



Fix your goddamn game. We should not have to wait a half hour for a single match, only to get killed within 2 minutes (somtimes less if there is a good killer) and have to restart the wait. We keep recieving patches that seem to completely divert the attention of the community away from their outcries of pain at the game's state. Minor, insignificant things are being changed such as little speech bubbles in the chat and new icons for the spacebar appearing onscreen. This aggrivates a few players I've talked to because they feel it's akin to asking an ice cream shop for a scoop of chocolate, and them handing you pure white vanilla with chocolate chips while they grin and take your money. New content gets added that only aggrivates players more because none of it makes any sense, like they didn't even think about it past having the idea, coding it, and putting it in the game. Things get nerfed, perks get changed, and none of it seems to be for the better. It almost seems like we're left to just keep on guessing what their priorities are or what they are thinking. 

An amazing concept for a game, creative, fresh, and awesome, you just failed horribly in the execution and making it worthy of being played. You have to fix the core issues of the game itself, or you will lose your fans, and I do not want that with the amount of potential this game has. Perhaps I have been ignorant in this review because I do not fully understand your process. If so I sincerely apologize, but I am just voicing my own feelings as well as others'.

Buggy Buggy Buggy Buggy.

Every time they roll out a new feature they create new bugs and they never adequately detail what has been changed or fixed in the patch notes. The game is still very unstable and DC's occur very frequently. The game is not optimized and runs poorly on even high end hardware.

Do not buy this game. In order to play with friends you have to hit the ready button over and over again for at least 10 minutes. The devs released 'free' dlc which introduced more content and 10 times as many new bugs. I honestly feel like they won't fix the ready up button so that you go over the 2 hour refund time limit.

I think that some of the negative reviews for this game are a little harsh as they are still fixing things that are a little buggy

Pros: 
-very fun to play, even some of the people giving it negative reviews have about 80+ hours game play, a match lasts 30 mins tops
-its fun to play with friends on team speak
-what you have to do and where you have to go is easy to pick up after a couple of games
-it is a tense game, you will be on the edge of your seat if there is a good killer

cons:
-yeah some things need to be sorted still like match making is still a little buggy, although there is a huge improvement after todays patch
-yeah sometimes it is unbalanced in the killers favour, but games arent impossible to win, and it is something they are working on 

overall for £12 it really is worth it. It is a lot of fun to play alone or with others.

There are a lot of things that could be improved. For me, that doesn't detract in the slightest how fun this game is for me. Ever since I discovered this game a month or so before Beta I was instantly into it. The concept, gameplay, everything seemed fun and new and exciting. I participated in Beta and loved the game, and I still do. I will stick by this game because of all the games I've ever played (Trust me I've played TONS) this is one of the games I always will come back to. The devs are working hard on keeping the game fresh and fun, and they truly care about the game. I am really excited for the future of this game, and don't let others take away your interest. This is a competitive game that has so much replayability all at once. The beginning is a bit of a grind but the grind is worth it. I've clocked almost 200 hours including Beta time with this game and I won't stop. If the concept interests you at all I encourage you to try this game out (especially this weekend since it's free!!!). I love this game and I really hopeif you're reading this you'll give it a chance.

Dead by Daylight is a very fun game, but the current version of the game is too broken for me to recommend it to any of you.

Dead By Daylight is a survival game where the main goal of the game is to turn on five generators and open an exit game all while one of three possible killers try to sacrifice you to the entity.

Each map is also randomly generated which helps build tension in almost every match. Some of the structures are all the same, but they are placed differently every match. Once you hear the heartbeat and give into a chase your heart will start pumping fast.

There's also the thrill of the kill as you can play as one of three killers. The Wraith is a killer which has the ability where you can mask your heartbeat and turn invisible, but while you're invisible you can't attack anyone. The Trapper which has traps he can use to trap survivors with well placed beartraps and the The Hillbilly which has a chainsaw which gives him an infinite sprint. All killers have strengths and weaknesses and it boils down to your preference. 

Now I love this game and I think it's a really fun experience, but it has too many issues to get a positive rating from me. 

First of all this games community is absolute trash. It's filled with salty people, who quit as soon as they are dead and killers who aren't able to kill anyone in the match. If a killer leaves the match before you escape then you're gonna derank which is absolute garbage.

The matchmaking is also terrible. It takes forever to get into a game and is even worse for Survive With Friends, it takes around 15 minutes (sometimes even more) to get into a single game, which is absurd since most games last the exact amount of time.

The game also has bugs like character models glitching, items disappearing before the match starts and many more to list here.

Overall Dead By Daylight is an incredibly fun game, but it's too buggy right now for a positive rating. If it was more stable I would say it's definitely worth it, but as of now, wait for a lot of fixes.

Let me start by saying I really did enjoy this game and the concept, but unfortunately the devs ruined it for me. The play with friends queue system is absolutely horrible, it is basically a game of pressing ready up every 8 or so seconds. Granted it is better than lobby hopping before they even had the survive with friends mode, but still nonetheless frustrating. Another huge annoyance is having players from other regions in your game, it gives killers an unfair lag advantage and I hope they set up a better location system in the future. My final complaint is the latest updates which seem to favor the killer more than anything. This is subjective however I don't think many people enjoy a teleporting killer with wallhacks very much. Overall I DO NOT suggest buying this game just yet, I would wait for it to mature a little bit and for the devs to fix some of the issues which range from random crashing to stats being completely wiped. I hope one day I can return to this game and have fun with it again.

Game is in a very poor state, that is completely overrun by survivors playing on coms and killers that have been nerfed hard everytime one seems to be viable. Put on top of that a massive grind and very toxic players, making the new player experience absolutely horrible.

I think I also forgot to mention the shit ton of DLC that is in this game, each one introducing 1 or 2 new survivors and a killer. If you want to actually stand a chance playing this game, you will need to buy them to grind them out for there perks.

Stay clear of the game and safe yourself a lot of time and money.

Some people say this is more or less the best game in its genre, but that does not mean this is a good game.

The various players and their choices make this game Frustrating and fantastic all at once.  With any multiplayer it's nice to get a good team, but sometimes if not often you'll get a team that'll abandon you or is just unlucky or bad.

Mid game crashing and trouble finding games aside, I have never had such an overwhelming "edge of your seat" feeling in any other game outside of League of Legends ranked matches. Holy cow, I definitely recommend this game! I've only been playing for about 3~ hours and I'm having a blast, my only problem is the longevity of this game. Even then, at $16 dollars on sale right now, If I end up getting bored quickly, I would still say the game was worth it.

I bought this game a couple of days ago, right before the free weekend. It looked super fun to try with my friends.

The short answer: this game is actually really fun. When you actually get queued up, it's a refreshingly addictive asymmetrical multiplayer survival game. I had to contain my screams and heavy breathing at 3am while I hid below a window in a room--watching the killer pacing outside, looking for me.

This leads to the problem: THE QUEUEING. Sure, go ahead and change your Steam download region as recommended in some forum posts, but it won't help. I have spent 4.6 hours playing the game, but really, I've successfully matched in only about 4 games during that time. We had to make custom private matches to keep playing (which isn't nearly as fun).

Long queue times isn't necessarily the problem: the "Ready!" interface is confusing and (I'm pretty sure) buggy as hell. You press "Ready!" with your team to be kicked out of queue instantly because "No matches found." You will then spend 20 minutes pressing "Ready!" and repeating this process before actually finding a game. You will then have a high chance of the people you are matched with leaving because you're a noob or because there's lag. Or, maybe you think you're surviving really well until you randomly win while fixing a generator you blew up four times--because the killer either DC'd or just plain quit.

Maybe the free weekend will get more people to play and more matches can be found.

TLDR: 
The game is good. 
The queueing system is terrible. 
10/10 if you play either alone or with at least four people (as survivors). 
5/10 if you try to play with one or two friends because good luck finding a game.

I really wanted to like this game but Dead by Daylight has still too many bugs for an released game. 

If you looking forward to play this game with your friends get ready to be frustrated because the Queuetimes and Queue System is buggy as hell. First you wait around 5 mins till you get maybe in a lobby then the Killer quits and you get thrown out of the lobby. You will spend more time with finding a match rather than actually playing a match for real. 

I waited now long enough for a prober fix, sadly it seems that new content is more important than fixing some critical issues. 

All in all this game feels more like a Beta and not a released game.

Update: 13.09.16

The Queue is still not fixed after so many updates and season restarts. Why isn't that a priority for the Developers.

Update: 07.08.17

The Queue System is pretty much fixed finally. I'm glad they doing some good work there! Finally i can give this Game a Thumb up again!

Das Spiel ist echt gut gemacht und sorgt für viele Spannende situationen und nervenkitzel. Angefangen bei der LOBBY SUCHE da ist es echt glücksache ob man eine findet oder nicht. Selbst wenn man als Killer eine Lobby aufmacht bleibt man recht lange alleine. Man sollte schon viel geduld mit bringen um in ein Spiel zu kommen. Sollte man es aber doch mal geschaft haben gibt es Spannung, Spass und ein recht fragwürdiges Teamplay. Sobald die Generatoren gemacht sind und die türen geöffnet laufen alle weg selbst wenn welche am Hacken hängen, recht frustrierend wenn man selbst über die hälfte der generatoren gemacht hat 2-3 leute vom haken geholt und verartztet hat und man selbst dann nicht gerettet wird. Alles im allen ein gelungenes Spiel aber das beitreten von Games hat noch kinderkrankheiten.

Super jeu de survie qui va vous foutre les chocotes ahah Je le recommande a tous,Bien marrant a plusieur  par contre a corriger quelque bug !

In an attempt to stop people using macros the devs have taken a nuclear approach that makes the game unplayable for some.

I am no longer able to use a steam controller. my backup controller, a dualshock 4 has also fallen victim of the update and the touchpad no longer works.. which means sitting near the mouse and keyboard is now a necessity.

i have sunk many hours into this game but the devs are the most shortsighted lazy people i have ever come across.
他们越恐惧，我就越快乐，真的，这就是我玩这游戏的风格。
Great game! Love it. Screw all the haters. Best game on steam that you can get for less than $20.

The game is awesome dont get me wrong but there's something very wrong with it. IT DOESN'T HAVE A FRICKING PARTY MODE!! Like come on this game isn't early access. Help me the Gods of this world to help these developers. Other than that it's a pretty good game.
